mapper.select: SELECT user_id, id, start_time, end_time, status FROM t_orders

SELECT o.user_id AS user_id, o.id AS order_id, m.id AS id, m.name AS name, m.address AS address, m.url AS url, m.ts AS ts, m.crew AS crew, oi.status AS status FROM t_orders AS o INNER JOIN t_order_items AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN t_measures AS m ON oi.item_id = m.id WHERE o.id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id}

SELECT o.user_id AS user_id, o.id AS order_id, c.id AS id, c.name AS name, c.url AS url, c.ts AS ts, c.type AS type, oi.status AS status FROM t_orders AS o INNER JOIN t_order_items AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN t_contracts AS c ON oi.item_id = c.id WHERE o.id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id};

SELECT o.user_id AS user_id, o.id AS order_id, d.id AS id, d.name AS name, d.url AS url, d.ts AS ts, d.designer AS designer, oi.status AS status FROM t_orders AS o INNER JOIN t_order_items AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN t_designs AS d ON oi.item_id = d.id WHERE o.id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id};

SELECT o.user_id AS user_id, o.id AS order_id, d.id AS id, d.name AS name, d.url AS url, d.ts AS ts, d.crew AS crew, oi.status AS status FROM t_orders AS o INNER JOIN t_order_items AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN t_disclaims AS d ON oi.item_id = d.id WHERE o.id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id};

SELECT o.user_id AS user_id, o.id AS order_id, p.id AS id, p.name AS name, p.url AS url, p.category AS category, p.enabled AS enabled, oi.status AS status FROM t_orders AS o INNER JOIN t_order_items AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN t_projects AS p ON oi.item_id = p.id WHERE o.id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id};

SELECT o.user_id AS user_id, o.id AS order_id, m.id as id, mc.class_name as class_name, mc.name as category, m.brand as brand, m.name as name, m.price as price, m.url as url FROM t_orders AS o INNER JOIN t_order_items AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN t_materials AS m ON oi.item_id = m.id INNER JOIN t_mat_category AS mc ON m.category = mc.id WHERE o.id = #{order_id} AND o.user_id = #{user_id};
